member.name: T:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBReader
member.summary: Read features stored as ESRI GeoDatabase binary format in a SqlServer database, and converts these features to format.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBReader.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a GDBReader that creates objects using a basic GeometryFactory.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBReader.#ctor(GeoAPI.Geometries.IGeometryFactory)
member.summary: Creates a GDBReader that creates objects using the given GeometryFactory.
member.param: The factory used to create Geometrys.

member.name: T:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBWriter
member.summary: Writes features as ESRI GeoDatabase binary format in a SqlServer database, and converts this features to Geometry format.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBWriter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a GDBWriter that creates objects using a basic GeometryFactory.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBWriter.Write(GeoAPI.Geometries.IGeometry)
member.summary: Returns a byte array containing binary data for the given Geometry.

member.name: M:NetTopologySuite.IO.GDBWriter.Write(GeoAPI.Geometries.IGeometry,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes a Geometry into a given Stream.
